name: Base Game
description: Fantasy Flight Games' set of values, card capabilities and stats played around the world, occasionally changed by their FAQs. The first edition is currently supported in this mode and the 2nd edition will eventually be supported through here as well.

name: 2nd Edition beta
description: (will require a vassal module version AFTER 8.0.5) Beta version of the 2nd edition of the base game. Temporary squads are spawned by entering the following keywords in the autospawn text field: tcdemo1 (empire: Feroph, Stele and Blacks) - tcdemo2 (rebel: tubes + gray + Jek)

name: HWK R Cool Altmode
description: Created by Mu0n to test this feature. Spawn a rebel HWk-290 rebel operative pilot and see how its stats is changed from its default pilot skill 2 to 11.

name: X-Wing Supremacy
description: description to be filled in by oilerx7 and co later on!
